lyrics:
16 contributorstake it from me lyricsverse 1
i think me and you should blow this off
so much for the afterparty
lets tell everybody we got lost
i think me and you should do
our own thing our own way
at my place why wait

chorus
take it from me if you want a tshirt to sleep in
its my favorite but you can keep it
it looks good baby you should leave it
hangin off your shoulder
give me them bare feet dancin down a hall and
smilin at me runnin your finger down the wall
you know what i want i got what you need
take it from me yeah

verse 2
baby you should stop right now right here
right where we wanna be
ill spin you around and lets just see
where this thing goes
all i know is that im all yours all night
ive got nothin but time
see jordan davis liveget tickets as low as 35you might also likechorus
so take it from me if you want a tshirt to sleep in
its my favorite but you can keep it
it looks good baby you should leave it
hangin off your shoulder
give me them bare feet dancin down a hall and
smilin at me runnin your finger down the wall
you know what i want i got what you need
take it from me yeah
take it from me yeah

bridge
you can steal a kiss i wont call you a thief
but take it from me
what i got to give you can have for free
just take it from me

chorus
take it from me if you want a tshirt to sleep in
its my favorite but you can keep it

hangin off your shoulder

outro
take my word take my heart

but baby take it from me

but take it from me

just take it from me
